mapper.sql: pk_dorm_id, dorm_building_id, building_levelth, dorm_type, dorm_num, dorm_desc, status, create_time, create_user_id, last_modify_time, last_modify_user_id, memo
mapper.select:
select
distinct
'true' as QUERYID,
from rm_dorm
order by ${orderByClause}
mapper.insert:
insert into rm_dorm
pk_dorm_id,
dorm_building_id,
building_levelth,
dorm_type,
dorm_num,
dorm_desc,
status,
create_time,
create_user_id,
last_modify_time,
last_modify_user_id,
memo,

mapper.update:
update rm_dorm
pk_dorm_id = #{record.pkDormId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
dorm_building_id = #{record.dormBuildingId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
building_levelth = #{record.buildingLevelth,jdbcType=INTEGER},
dorm_type = #{record.dormType,jdbcType=INTEGER},
dorm_num = #{record.dormNum,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
dorm_desc = #{record.dormDesc,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
status = #{record.status,jdbcType=INTEGER},
create_time = #{record.createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
create_user_id = #{record.createUserId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
last_modify_time = #{record.lastModifyTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
last_modify_user_id = #{record.lastModifyUserId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
memo = #{record.memo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

update rm_dorm set pk_dorm_id = #{record.pkDormId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, dorm_building_id = #{record.dormBuildingId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, building_levelth = #{record.buildingLevelth,jdbcType=INTEGER}, dorm_type = #{record.dormType,jdbcType=INTEGER}, dorm_num = #{record.dormNum,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, dorm_desc = #{record.dormDesc,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, status = #{record.status,jdbcType=INTEGER}, create_time = #{record.createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, create_user_id = #{record.createUserId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, last_modify_time = #{record.lastModifyTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, last_modify_user_id = #{record.lastModifyUserId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, memo = #{record.memo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update rm_dorm
dorm_building_id = #{dormBuildingId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
building_levelth = #{buildingLevelth,jdbcType=INTEGER},
dorm_type = #{dormType,jdbcType=INTEGER},
dorm_num = #{dormNum,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
dorm_desc = #{dormDesc,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
status = #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER},
create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
create_user_id = #{createUserId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
last_modify_time = #{lastModifyTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
last_modify_user_id = #{lastModifyUserId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
memo = #{memo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where pk_dorm_id = #{pkDormId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update rm_dorm set dorm_building_id = #{dormBuildingId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, building_levelth = #{buildingLevelth,jdbcType=INTEGER}, dorm_type = #{dormType,jdbcType=INTEGER}, dorm_num = #{dormNum,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, dorm_desc = #{dormDesc,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, status = #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, create_user_id = #{createUserId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, last_modify_time = #{lastModifyTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, last_modify_user_id = #{lastModifyUserId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, memo = #{memo,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where pk_dorm_id = #{pkDormId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: SELECT db.dorm_building_num AS dormBuildingNum, d.building_levelth AS buildingLevelth, d.dorm_num AS dormNum, d.dorm_type AS dormType, d.dorm_desc AS dormDesc FROM rm_dorm d LEFT JOIN rm_dorm_building db ON db.pk_dorm_building_id = d.dorm_building_id LEFT JOIN rm_dorm_student_rel dsr ON dsr.dorm_id = d.pk_dorm_id WHERE 1=1 AND dsr.student_id=#{studentId}
